trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única usados para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> com o banco de dados associado.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class that can only be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma classe abstrata que só pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The DbCommandBuilder class is provided for the convenience of provider writers creating their own command builders.
trans-unit.target: A classe DbCommandBuilder é fornecida para a conveniência de gravadores de provedor criando suas próprias construtores de comando.

trans-unit.source: By inheriting from this class, developers can implement provider specific behavior in their own code.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar desta classe, os desenvolvedores podem implementar o comportamento específico do provedor em seu próprio código.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>não gera automaticamente as instruções SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>com a fonte de dados associado.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create a DbCommandBuilder object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar um objeto DbCommandBuilder para gerar automaticamente instruções SQL para atualizações de tabela única se você definir a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the DbCommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, qualquer instrução SQL adicional que você não defina é geradas pelo DbCommandBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The DbCommandBuilder registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O DbCommandBuilder se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos sempre que você definir o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> or DbCommandBuilder object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode associar um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>ou ao objeto DbCommandBuilder entre si de uma só vez.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the DbCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, o DbCommandBuilder usa o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para recuperar um conjunto necessário de metadados automaticamente.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata has been retrieved (for example, after the first update), you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se você alterar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>após recuperar os metadados (por exemplo, após a primeira atualização), você deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>método para atualizar os metadados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column.
trans-unit.target: O `SelectCommand` também deve retornar pelo menos uma chave primária ou coluna exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: If none exist, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is generated, and the commands are not generated.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>exceção é gerada e os comandos não são gerados.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The DbCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O DbCommandBuilder também usa o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>e as <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciadas por <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if any of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: O usuário deve chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se qualquer uma dessas propriedades são modificadas, ou se o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>será substituído.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>Propriedades retêm os valores anteriores.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the DbCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, o DbCommandBuilder seja desassociado do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados não são mais usados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a class that inherits from the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de uma classe que herda de <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Allows the provider implementation of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class to handle additional parameter properties.
trans-unit.target: Permite a implementação de provedor do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe para manipular propriedades de parâmetro adicionais.

trans-unit.source: This method allows an implementation of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> class to handle provider-specific parameter properties.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que uma implementação de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>classe para manipular propriedades de parâmetro específicos do provedor.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> to which the additional modifications are applied.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"> </xref> para que as modificações adicionais são aplicadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> from the schema table provided by <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetSchemaTable*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> da tabela de esquema fornecida por <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetSchemaTable*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetSchemaTable*>

trans-unit.source: The type of command being generated; INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de comando que está sendo gerado; Inserir, atualizar ou excluir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameter is part of the update or delete WHERE clause, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is part of the insert or update values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o parâmetro faz parte da atualização ou exclusão de cláusula WHERE, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se faz parte dos valores de inserção ou atualização.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"> </xref> para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém uma cadeia de caracteres usada como o separador de catálogo para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que indica o separador de catálogo para uso com uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Specifies which <xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"></xref> is to be used by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica qual <xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"> </xref> deve ser usado pelo <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns one of the <xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"></xref> values describing the behavior of this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um do <xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"> </xref> valores que descrevem o comportamento desse <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> object for which Transact-SQL statements are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual Transact-SQL instruções são geradas automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>método e o `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>invoca o método Dispose protegido com o parâmetro descartando definido como `true`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize`invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>referências.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>método de cada objeto referenciado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões na fonte de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetDeleteCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetDeleteCommand modificar o texto de comando e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetDeleteCommand ainda será usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões na fonte de dados, opcionalmente usando colunas para nomes de parâmetro de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modificar o texto do comando e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar as inserções na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetInsertCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque ele retorna o texto do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetInsertCommand modificar o texto de comando e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetInsertCommand ainda será usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções na fonte de dados, opcionalmente usando colunas para nomes de parâmetro de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>método para solução de problemas ou informativas fins porque retorna o texto do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modificar o texto do comando e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Generation of the parameters based on column names succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: A geração dos parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna terá êxito apenas se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the specified parameter in the format of @p*#*.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nome do parâmetro especificado no formato de @p * # *.

trans-unit.source: Use when building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: Use quando estiver criando um construtor de comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The number to be included as part of the parameter's name..
trans-unit.target: O número a ser incluído como parte do nome do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter with the specified number appended as part of the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do parâmetro com o número especificado anexado como parte do nome do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Returns the full parameter name, given the partial parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nome completo do parâmetro, considerando o nome de parâmetro parciais.

trans-unit.source: The partial name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: O nome parcial do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The full parameter name corresponding to the partial parameter name requested.
trans-unit.target: O nome completo do parâmetro correspondente ao nome de parâmetro parciais solicitado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the placeholder for the parameter in the associated SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o espaço reservado para o parâmetro na instrução SQL associada.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: Este método destina-se ao uso por gravadores de provedor de criação de um construtor de comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The number to be included as part of the parameter's name.
trans-unit.target: O número a ser incluído como parte do nome do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter with the specified number appended.
trans-unit.target: O nome do parâmetro com o número especificado anexado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the schema table for the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a tabela de esquema para o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: Este método destina-se ao uso por gravadores de provedor de criação de um construtor de comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> for which to retrieve the corresponding schema table.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> para o qual recuperar a tabela de esquema correspondente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that represents the schema for the specific <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> que representa o esquema para o determinado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar atualizações na fonte de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetUpdateCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetUpdateCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetUpdateCommand modificar o texto de comando e, em seguida, definir explicitamente que <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetUpdateCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetUpdateCommand ainda será usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar atualizações na fonte de dados, opcionalmente usando colunas para nomes de parâmetro de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modificar o texto de comando e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Generation of the parameters based on column names succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: A geração dos parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna terá êxito apenas se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout*>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction*>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType*>, and <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> properties on the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resets the <>*>, <>*>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType*>, and <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> properties on the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType*>

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: Este método destina-se ao uso por gravadores de provedor de criação de um construtor de comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> to be used by the command builder for the corresponding insert, update, or delete command.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> para ser usado pelo construtor de comando para a inserção correspondente, atualização ou exclusão de comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> instance to use for each insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> instância a ser usado para cada inserção, atualização ou operação de exclusão.

trans-unit.source: Passing a null value allows the InitializeCommand method to create a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object based on the Select command associated with the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Passar um valor nulo permite que o método InitializeCommand para criar um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto baseado no comando Select associado a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador sem aspas no caso de catálogo correto, retorna corretas entre aspas a forma de identificador, incluindo corretamente escape quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão entre aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: As aspas inseridas dentro do identificador são caracteres de escape.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere inicial ou caracteres a ser usado ao especificar os objetos de banco de dados (por exemplo, tabelas ou colunas) cujos nomes contêm caracteres como espaços ou símbolos reservados.

trans-unit.source: Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons.
trans-unit.target: Algumas fontes de dados podem ter objetos que podem conter caracteres como espaços, vírgulas e ponto e vírgula.

trans-unit.source: To accommodate this capability, use the QuotePrefix and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A> properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name.
trans-unit.target: Para acomodar esse recurso, use o QuotePrefix e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>Propriedades para especificar delimitadores como um colchete esquerdo e um colchete direito para encapsular o nome do objeto.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you cannot change the QuotePrefix or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A> properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você não pode alterar o QuotePrefix ou <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>Propriedades após uma inserção, atualização ou exclusão comando tiver sido gerado, você pode alterar suas configurações após a chamada a `Update` método <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>

trans-unit.source: The beginning character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: O caractere inicial ou caracteres a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser alterada depois que um insert, update ou delete comando tiver sido gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere de final ou caracteres a ser usado ao especificar os objetos de banco de dados (por exemplo, tabelas ou colunas) cujos nomes contêm caracteres como espaços ou símbolos reservados.

trans-unit.source: Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons.
trans-unit.target: Algumas fontes de dados podem ter objetos que podem conter caracteres como espaços, vírgulas e ponto e vírgula.

trans-unit.source: To accommodate this capability, use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A> and QuoteSuffix properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name.
trans-unit.target: Para acomodar esse recurso, use o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>e QuoteSuffix propriedades para especificar delimitadores como um colchete esquerdo e um colchete direito para encapsular o nome do objeto.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you cannot change the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A> or QuoteSuffix properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você não pode alterar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>ou propriedades QuoteSuffix após uma inserção, atualização ou exclusão comando tiver sido gerado, você pode alterar suas configurações após a chamada a `Update` método <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ending character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: O caractere ou caracteres usar final.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Clears the commands associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Limpa os comandos associados a este <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling the RefreshSchema method effectively removes all the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> objects referred to by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método RefreshSchema efetivamente remove todos os <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objetos referenciado pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador de eventos para o <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> instance containing information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"> </xref> instância que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere a ser usado para o separador entre o identificador do esquema e de quaisquer outros identificadores.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for an identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, servidores de banco de dados indicam que o esquema para um identificador, separando o nome do esquema de identificador com alguns caracteres.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as **Person:CustomerName**, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o SQL Server usa um vírgula, criando identificadores completos como **pessoa: CustomerName**, onde "Pessoa" é o nome do esquema, e "CustomerName" é o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade permite que desenvolvedores modificar esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado como separador de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether all column values in an update statement are included or only changed ones.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se todos os valores de coluna em uma instrução update são incluídos ou apenas aqueles alterado.

trans-unit.source: The UPDATE statement generated by a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> can include update information about all the columns, or it can include information only about those columns whose values have changed.
trans-unit.target: A instrução de atualização gerada por um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>pode incluir informações de atualização sobre todas as colunas, ou você pode incluir informações somente sobre as colunas cujos valores foram alterados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Setting the SetAllValues property to `true` causes the generated UPDATE statement to include all the columns, whether their values have changed or not.
trans-unit.target: Definindo a propriedade SetAllValues como `true` faz com que a instrução UPDATE gerada incluir todas as colunas, se seus valores foram alterados ou não.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the UPDATE statement generated by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> includes all columns; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it includes only changed columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a instrução UPDATE é gerado pelo <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> inclui todas as colunas; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se ele inclui somente alterada colunas.

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> to handle the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Registra o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> para lidar com o <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"> </xref> evento para um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: Este método destina-se ao uso por gravadores de provedor de criação de um construtor de comando personalizado.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> is added to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>, it is registered for the DbDataAdapter's **RowUpdating** event.
trans-unit.target: Quando um novo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>é adicionada para o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>, está registrado para o DbDataAdapter **RowUpdating** evento.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If this method is called again with the same <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> is unregistered for that DbDataAdapter's **RowUpdating** event.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método é chamado novamente com o mesmo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>não está registrado para esse DbDataAdapter **RowUpdating** evento.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> to be used for the update.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref> a ser usado para a atualização.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador entre aspas, retorna a forma sem aspas correta de identificador, incluindo corretamente sem escape quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador de.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terá seus removidas as aspas inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas, com aspas inseridas corretamente sem escape.
